title: Report Document Information
definition: Click to open the template Report Document based on the type of report and grade level

title: Type of Report
definition: Select the type of report you want to generate.

title: Student's Name
definition: Enter the full name of the student.

title: Grade Level
definition: Enter the student's grade level (e.g., Grade 2).

title: Subject
definition: Specify the subject for the report card.

title: Strengths
definition: Describe the student's strengths in this area.

title: Areas for Improvement
definition: Mention areas where the student can improve.

title: Key Learning
definition: Highlight the most significant skills demonstrated.

title: Next Steps in Learning
definition: Suggest ways to support further development.

title: Grade Percentage
definition: Enter the grade percentage or letter grade as applicable.
